item.description: Anita Shreve will be at the Odyssey Bookshop on May 3rd at 7pm. This is an excellent opportunity to meet the author of our May book selection Body Surfing. The Odyssey Bookshop is located in the Village Commons in South Hadley MA. The commons are right across the street from Mt. Holyoke College on Rt. 116. For more info on this bookshop visit http://odysseybks.com.... Their website has not yet been updated with the author event info but I called and verified with the bookshop.
item.name: Meet the Author - Anita Shreve
